Kazume for small businesses.

Collaborate and engage with your customers using Kazume Smart Forms.

Easily engage with your customers and employees in one system. You can store and share important data and files with your customers. Your customers will get their own portal to manage their data and interact on mutual transactions. You will be able to track the progress of each transaction with audit tracking.

Kazume for the enterprise.

Improve customer engagement and build trust.

The Kazume agreement engine breaks complex transactions into a series of easy-to-follow steps; simultaneously, it uses your client’s stored information to auto-fill forms. And with your customer’s agreement, your CRM is updated with accurate data. Transactions are transparent and controlled by clear usage agreements. That, coupled with Kazume’s streamlined efficiency, provides a new opportunity for building trust.
